name: staff-scheduler
description: Staff Markets & Shows Scheduler - Schedule staff to attend market stalls and shows

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.db:migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate dev --name init
scripts.db:seed: cd server && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
